alert.note: Alert for Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 10:35PM CDT until July 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RICE AND SOUTHEASTERN ELLSWORTH COUNTIES... At 1034 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geneseo, or 8 miles north of Lyons, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...50 to 60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Little River, Geneseo, Frederick and Kanopolis Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
